name: Howard Johnson Express Inn Tallahassee

reviews.text: This hotel takes pets of any size for an additional $10/pet. Rooms were basic but clean and good sized. There's exterior hallways, so you do get some noise from the street. Linens were clean, but the pillows are thin. There's a microwave/fridge in the room; I used the fridge and it was clean and cold.
reviews.title: Basic older motel, Pet Friendly
It was decent...
reviews.text: We had a room with a king bed; the room was very large, with a sitting area with a small sofa and a coffee table.

reviews.title: Horrible!
reviews.text: There's a free continental breakfast in the morning, but it's not worth walking to the lobby to get it.
Like most HoJo's, this hotel has a little wear on it, but for a good night's sleep after a long drive it's worth the price paid.
reviews.title: Howard Johnson Express Inn N. Monroe St.

aka: Howard Johnson Express Inn Tallahassee Hotel
